titleStmt.title: The peace-maker: or, Solid reasons, perswading to peace: grounded upon the late Solemn covenant. / By H.B.
titleStmt.author: Burton, Henry, 1578-1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, at the Black-spread-Eagle near the west end of Pauls.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: after H. B: "urton" "March: 23 1645"; the second 6 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Black-spread-Eagle near the west end of Pauls.
